title: Getting to Texel
content:
# Welcome to Swift Island 2025!

## Getting Here

Texel is the largest and most populated island in the Wadden Sea. Getting to the island is straightforward - you'll need to take a ferry from Den Helder on the mainland.

### By Ferry
The TESO ferry runs regularly between Den Helder and 't Horntje on Texel. The journey takes about 20 minutes.

### Ferry Schedule
- **Summer Schedule (March - October)**: Every 30 minutes during peak hours
- **Winter Schedule (November - February)**: Every hour

## From Schiphol Airport

If you're flying into Amsterdam Schiphol Airport:

1. Take the train to Den Helder Centraal (approximately 1.5 hours)
2. Take bus 33 from the station to the ferry terminal (10 minutes)
3. Board the TESO ferry to Texel

## Conference Transportation

We provide hassle-free bus transportation from Schiphol Airport for all attendees. Check your confirmation email for pickup times and locations.

**Important**: Please arrive at least 30 minutes before your scheduled pickup time.

title: Accommodation Info
content:
# Your Stay at Swift Island

## Accommodation Types

We offer two types of accommodation at our beautiful venue:

### Bungalows
- 3 private bedrooms per bungalow
- Shared kitchen and living area
- Perfect for groups who want to cook together
- Garden terrace with outdoor seating

### Hotel Rooms
- Private bathroom in each room
- Daily housekeeping service
- Room service available
- Perfect for those who prefer hotel amenities

## What's Included

- 4 nights accommodation (Monday - Friday)
- Daily breakfast
- Lunch and dinner during conference days
- Access to all conference facilities
- Bicycle rental for the duration of your stay

## Check-in Information

- **Check-in**: Monday, September 1st from 3:00 PM
- **Check-out**: Friday, September 5th by 11:00 AM
- **Reception**: Open 24/7 for assistance

## Room Preferences

While we try our best to accommodate room type preferences, we cannot guarantee your preferred choice due to limited availability.

title: Conference Schedule Overview
content:
# Swift Island 2025 Schedule

## Conference Days

**Tuesday, September 2nd - Thursday, September 4th**

### Daily Schedule

#### Morning Session (9:00 AM - 12:00 PM)
- Welcome & Breakfast (9:00 - 9:30)
- Workshop Session 1 (9:30 - 11:00)
- Coffee Break (11:00 - 11:15)
- Workshop Session 2 (11:15 - 12:00)

#### Afternoon Session (1:30 PM - 5:30 PM)
- Lunch (12:00 - 1:30)
- Workshop Session 3 (1:30 - 3:00)
- Coffee Break (3:00 - 3:15)
- Workshop Session 4 (3:15 - 4:30)
- Daily Wrap-up (4:30 - 5:30)

#### Evening
- Dinner (6:30 - 8:00)
- Social Activities (8:00 - 11:00)

## Workshop Tracks

Each day features multiple workshop tracks:
- **SwiftUI & UI Frameworks**
- **Server-Side Swift**
- **iOS Development Best Practices**
- **Swift Concurrency & Performance**
- **Testing & Quality Assurance**

## Special Events

- **Monday Evening**: Welcome Reception
- **Wednesday Evening**: Beach BBQ & Games
- **Thursday Evening**: Closing Ceremony

Detailed schedules will be available in the conference app closer to the event date.
